html.p: Definition. If [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] is an [mathjaxinline]m\times n[/mathjaxinline] matrix, and [mathjaxinline]B[/mathjaxinline] is an [mathjaxinline]n\times p[/mathjaxinline] matrix, then [mathjaxinline]AB[/mathjaxinline] is the [mathjaxinline]m\times p[/mathjaxinline] matrix whose [mathjaxinline]i[/mathjaxinline]th column is [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] times the [mathjaxinline]i[/mathjaxinline]th column of [mathjaxinline]B[/mathjaxinline].
